meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ani Gupta Kimberly Bond Jamie Newland Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7512.

td.p: Ani Gupta, an economist from Berkeley, California
Kimberly Bond, a writer and stay-at-home mom from Cumming, Georgia
Jamie Newland, a loan coordinator from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,500)

tr.td: FROM THEIR INAUGURAL ADDRESSES
IN THE DICTIONARY
GRAVE MATTERS
STATE THE CITY
DRINKS FOR EVERYONE!
GAMBLING ON VEGAS MOVIES

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
